nodes.text: The Panteer's Pride was a GR-75 medium transport that was part of an Alderaanian refugee convoy after the destruction of Alderaan. The fleet of Imperial Commodore Rae Sloane was ordered to destroy the convoy at Fostar Haven, but failed to prevent the convoy from escaping due to the defection of Helix Squadron Captain Lindon Javes with assistance from the Rebel Alliance's Echo Squadron and a fleet of the Alliance.
The Panteer's Pride first appeared in the 2020 video game Star Wars: Squadrons. It shares its name with House Panteer, one of the noble houses of Alderaan in the Star Wars Legends continuity.
